content.prompt:
Used by permission

Which of the following is a characteristic of the work shown that allows it to be attributed to the Edo peoples of Benin?

choices.label: The carved wood, which is a material reserved for depictions of the oba.
The naturalism of the depiction, which shows personal characteristics of the oba.
The painted terra cotta, which represents the strength of the oba.
The beaded coral neck rings and crown, which were associated with the oba.

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
